'''Beta 1.19.70.24''' (Android), '''Preview 1.19.70.24''' (Windows, Xbox) or '''Preview 1.19.70.25'''<ref>{{tweet|jdavidfries|1629174712021708800|We had an issue in publishing iOS|February 24, 2023}}</ref> (iOS, iPadOS) is the fifth beta/''Preview'' version for [[Bedrock Edition 1.19.70]], released on February 23-24, 2023,<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/13364608987149|title=Minecraft Beta & Preview - 1.19.70.24|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=February 23, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Sneaking]]'''
* Reverted the changes related to 1.5 gap sneaking.

== Fixes ==
'''Gameplay'''
* Players now stop sneaking in Powder Snow after letting go of the sneak button. ({{bug|MCPE-166518}})
'''Marketplace'''
* Fixed an error that could occur when clicking on a Minecoin bundle.</onlyinclude>
